$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for validation.

apiSpecsFolderPath.description: Relative or absolute path to the folder with API specs. Used to compare JWT token permissions against minimal required scopes.

permissionsToExclude.description: The scopes to ignore and not include in the report. Default: ['profile', 'openid', 'offline_access', 'email'].

schemeName.description: The name of the security scheme definition. Used to determine minimal permissions required for API calls.
